value.summary: All provided JSON outputs closely track the report content without introducing new quantitative claims. Numerical values (dayside brightness temperature 342 ± 22 K, epsilon 0.19 +0.23/-0.14, Bond albedo <0.08, 15 µm band depth 96 ppm, likelihood ratio 7.4, preferred pressure 0.3–1.0 bar) are reproduced exactly with appropriate context and do not overstate certainty (e.g., “hint,” “consistent with,” “favored,” “not fully ruled out”). Core findings are covered (joint atmosphere vs no-atmosphere 비교
